code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./Friend2.css';import{baseurl}from'../url';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Friend2=()=>{const[friend,setAllFriends]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchFriends=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("".concat(baseurl,"/friend/all"));const friends=response.data;console.log(friends);setAllFriends(friends);}catch(error){console.error('While Fetching Friends',error);}};fetchFriends();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-friends",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Logged In User's Friends"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"friends",children:friend.map(f=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:f.fName},f._id);})})]});};export default Friend2;
